channel.title: Help needed
channel.description: Well, im owner of a server, but when i try to drop/trade it says: owners cant drop/trade. I searched for it in my player.java, playerhandler.java, client.java but i cant find anything? Can 1 of u guyz please say where i can change it so i can trade and drop.

item.title: Help needed
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

Ok, in your client class search for this or whatever the message you get says when you try to change it.

sM("Owners are not allowed to trade!")

Then you should see something like this.

if(other.playerRights == 2){ sM("Owners are not allowed to trade!"); return; } if(playerRights == 2){ sM("Owners are not allowed to trade!"); return; }
Then just edit it or delete it all together.
Hope this helped =P

Read full topic
